definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (late) raise up (NH id.; Aram. [[זְקַף]], zqap; As. zaḳâpu, Asrb:Hunting Inscr. IR 7, ix. A, 3; Nö:ZMG 1886, 725 suggests Ar. zaqafa carry off (Ḳam.), orig. lift up)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. and only fig. of ´[[י]]'s dealing with prostrate men:—[[וְזוֹקֵף לְכָל־הַכְּפוּפִים]] Ps 145:14 (‖[[סוֹמֵךְ]]); [[זׁקֵף כְּפוּפִים]] Ps 146:8 ´[[י]] raiseth up prostrate ones.
